Mid-South Heat & Air (ChIJB-SmCwN91ocRDZ.text:
Great people, fantastic work, trustworthy for multiple reasons:

Called them due to, what I would describe as, a scratching noise coming from my return vent whenever unit was running. Called Aaron and they came right over, pulled the part and commenced to explain what was going on. At the time I didn’t have the money but despite all that they treated me like a paying customer. Even telling me if it goes out over LABOR DAY WEEKEND, of all weekends, we have options. Just call us. Glad it didn’t come to that. When I came up with the money for them to order and fix the issue they came right over. They kept me informed during the whole process, went above and beyond to check for other issues. They have been to my house multiple times and are always very courteous and willing to explain, in detail, the issues you’re having and how they are going to rectify them. Problem is most ppl don’t listen, but I digress. They don’t leave a mess as you can see from the picture, they went out of their way to maintain cleanliness and that’s much appreciated and most of the time overlooked and under praised. They even came today when my son was sleeping and managed to maneuver around quiet enough to where he didn’t even wake up till he finished his nap. I’m not sure how. Fair prices, good work, nice people. Will not be using anyone else, these guys are good to have in your contact list.
Did a good job and got my furnace fixed in no time!

Our work office was constantly hotter than outside. 80 degrees outside, 85 in the office.
After just a few hours, it holds a steady 65!! Even with the doors constantly in use. Work life this summer will no longer be miserable!!
Thank you from all of us at NEAR Ready Mix Paragould, AR.

These folks were on time, efficient, professional, personable, and best of all they provide quality services! We are incredibly grateful for ya'll and to finally be able to escape the heat and cool down!! Thank ya'll so very much for your time and energy!!
-The Near Ready Mix Paragould Plant
They show up when they say, usually the same day.  Everything is good when they leave.  They clean up after themselves.

Absolutely amazing company to work with.  Always on time and answers all the questions you have. Very reasonable and friendly.

Great service! They answered my call on a Saturday as soon as I called in the morning. They said they could check my issue that afternoon which they did. They kept me up to date on when they were on their way to my house and when my part came in, the cost, and with any questions I had. They had my air handler unit up and going in 30 minutes. I tried contacting 7 or so HVAC businesses in Paragould that day and only two answered my call. Mid-South was the only one that could help me, the other couldn't get a tech to me, but actually recommended me to call Mid-South. The others that I could leave messages with haven't even returned my call still. I'll use Mid-South again for sure!

Had one of our old air conditioners go out. Aaron promptly come out and try to put a bandaid on it until we could get it fixed. I knew it needed to be replaced but he still took the time to show us options and in the end was able to match our existing units. Literally charged half of the other people we called for a quote. These guys are the best, very nice, reasonably priced, knowledgeable, on time and had to fix the last guy's mistake on my unit, I have nothing but great things to say about this business and will definitely be using them again, thanks guys.

Aaron came right out and fixed our heat pump on a Saturday!  He's a friendly fella and he took the time to explain what he was doing. Breath of fresh air! Don't hesitate to call him if you have some AC/Heat issues.

Our ac went out in the middle of summer. They came out the very next day after I called them and worked till around 9pm trying to fix it. I contacted Etowah Plumbing about a plumbing issue I needed to be fixed ASAP. I was told they would be there that day unless the weather was bad. If the weather was bad, they’d be there first thing the next morning, and we would just have to play it by ear and they would call me. I did not continue to call around to find someone else because they said they would be there. Well that day, they never called or showed up. It did rain so I figured that was why. I called first thing the next morning. There was no answer and the voicemail was full. I sent a text asking if they were coming and immediately got a response saying that they broke the cable on the machine yesterday. No one contacted me to let me know. They knew I was on a time frame and I trusted them to be there. I understand that things happen, but they should have called. I could have had someone else lined up to get what I needed done.

White River Sewer & Drain (ChIJh2MXfjaVZ.text: We found this gentleman thru an emergency on a Saturday, with a google search. He came out and fixed our immediate problem, but discovered our septic tank was full of tree roots. Very professional and a pleasure to deal with. Was very transparent with what needed to be done, did promptly and very reasonable in pricing.  Most if not all other companies would just tell us to replace our tank, but he suggested just taking the top off and removing the roots.  Which is what he did, and repaired a corner of the tank that the roots broke off. Saved us thousands. I cannot give any higher recommendation of a person or a company.  If you need work within his scope, you would regret not using them. I will be using them for any sewar or drain issue that occurs.

Doug Smith is the owner of White River Sewer & Drain. He was a pleasure to work with and he will continue to have our support! He is very intelligent & knowledgeable in his line of work. His communication skills are outstanding. He is very quick to fix things in a timely manner. Lastly he is a very honest, hard working individual that we are all looking for today! Give Doug Smith a call & you won’t regret working with him, we didn’t! If I have any more issues down the road, he will be my first call! We appreciate you White River Sewer & Drain.

Amazing service. Took care of the problem even though it took several methods!

We had a major leak happen at the house with old piping, they came out that Monday and had everything completed for us in a timely manner. They also helped us with a tankless water heater install. Really nice guys who let us know what was happening throughout the entire process.
Called them and they came out when they said the would. The drain was plugged up bad. He didn’t give up and finally got it unstopped. Highly recommend this company.

We came home from out of town after the freeze in Jan/Feb 2023 and found that we had a water leak.  I called a few plumbers, all of whom were busy for 3 weeks out and said they would put our name on a list.  I found Kevin of Larry's plumbing and he had 3 people at my home within 1 day.  They worked and worked trying to find the leak to no avail.  He quoted a price to replace my pipes, which were in dire need because they were so old.  Within 1.5 wks we had brand new pipes at the quoted price.  His people are prompt, knowledgeable, courteous and accommodating.  I will never use another plumber and recommend Larry's to everyone.  I NEVER received a call back after placing my name on the list of several other plumbers.

Larry’s Plumbing/Mitchell Construction is AMAZING!! Kevin and his crew are top notch, great people. Hard workers, professional, courteous, and very knowledgeable, among many other great adjectives too many to name. Kevin and Co. even came in behind another plumber’s botched and OVERPRICED work, and had the problem fixed in less than an hour and half the cost!
They also replaced the total old clay sewer drainpipe and main waterline (even with many obstacles) and worked until it was done. They are the best!! I wish I could give them more than 5 stars. Oh, I can!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Thanks again guys!! You are the best! We now have not only new plumbers but new friends to match!! Salute!!

In July 2022 Larry's plumbing come and fixed a gas leak, installed my propane water heater and fixed a water leak. The last part of December our pipes froze and busted, it took a while; however, he always kept me updated on where we was on the list. They came out and fixed it. I do highly recommend Larry's plumbing.

Contacted Kevin Mitchell with Larrys Plumbing and he come right out and give me an estimate on the job I needed done. Kevin and his crew showed up when they said they were going to and worked until they got the job done. I needed them to redo the drains in my entry house. They completed what they could of my job at the time and told me to call them when I was ready to put the bath tub in. I called them yesterday about attaching the drain to the tub and they showed up today and completed that job. I am extremely pleased with the job they have done for me and will continue to call them when they are needed! Thank you for the great and fast service Kevin!
Have broken pipes spoke with Larry and he stated he would come the next day. He did not show up or even contact me that he would not be coming. Unacceptable business practice.

I called Larry’s and Kevin came right out. They found the problem, gave me a quote on replacing all the water lines in my home. I highly recommend these guys. They are up front , honest and dependable . They will be replacing all my lines. Thanks guys!!
Fair fast working and great customer service

Mike The Plumber (ChIJ82Ep3z8nq6YRbhwClc.text:
I had two water heaters in the alcove under my staircase downstairs that are original to the house that finally gave up the ghost -  after 43 years, they blew up! Talk about going into panic mode when you see water spewing out from under the stairs! Yikes!😱

So I called Mike The Plumber for rescue! Mike and his trusty sidekick Hunter did a bang-up job on my water emergency 🚨 and they had me back up and running with two brand new water heaters and all the electrical and plumbing fittings replaced in what must have been record time - just under 4 hours from start to finish!

Mike and Hunter’s work is top notch, in both conducting themselves as complete gentlemen, very respectful of myself and my home, and my two overly-friendly dogs, combined with the excellent work they did in replacing two very old, heavy, and rotted out water heaters in an extremely confined space under the stairs.

I have a couple of other plumbing projects that need doing, and I won’t hesitate to give Mike The Plumber a call and give the work to them again! I cannot stress enough how professional and friendly Mike and Hunter are, and I look forward to having them deal with my other plumbing woes/needs in the very near future - so you should have no hesitation in hiring these gentlemen. You won’t regret it, I can assure you of that!

We had a real plumbing emergency and they took the stress right out of the equation! Thank you, Mike and Hunter for doing a truly fantastic job!
Prompt return of my call! As a disabled Veteran I appreciate that.

After chasing a swimming pool pipe leak in our return pipes, we called on Mike to see if he had the detection equipment needed.  He was upfront with us on the initial visit, letting us know he had not diagnosed too many pools but was willing to work with us, and we came up with a plan.  Second visit out he brought all his equipment and his assistant.  We found the broken pipe within the first hour.  The detecting method was used to check existing lines, and all came out well.  Mike saved us countless hours of jack hammering concrete searching for the unknown.  Mike was punctual, and his communication was excellent.

Called with a problem and they were quick to come out. Hunter was very knowledgeable and took the time to explain what he was doing. We highly recommend their service and will keep their number for future plumbing needs.
Hunter was efficient and fast. Awesome work !!

Mike & Hunter put a new hot water heater in for me. I called Mike late in the day and he was at my house first thing the next morning. I live in an older home and the water heater was in a very tight space and and whoever had installed the previous one did not install it up to code. Mike said it was a very dangerous fire hazard. Hunter was excellent climbing up in small attic crawl space and down under house explaining everything as he was going along. So very pleased. I would definitely recommend  them for your job. They're the BEST! Thanks again Mike and Hunter!

Great communication tech took his time and throughly test shower to find out why it was leaking. He didn't give up when it wasn't easy and diagnosed it as a simple fix. Fast service fair pricing and great communication within the company to help the customer. I will use them in the future for some upcoming projects.

Mike has done plumbing work at our house twice now and has done an amazing job. First, we had a whole house backup due to roots growing into our old pipes. When we called Mike, he got back to us really quickly and was able to dig up and replace pipes and get it all fixed within just a few days which was amazing! Also worth mentioning that his prices are very fair. Not overpriced at all. Then, recently, we had a clog in the shower drain that was pretty bad. He answered my call and the next day was there to remove it! I would 100% recommend Mike the Plumber to any and everyone.

JP's Plumbing LLC (ChIJXWV4VEXv0ocR_8n1N.text: Jason came out on a Saturday afternoon fixed our immediate problem and gave us estimates for future work. He was prompt, professional, courteous, and didn't try to chop our heads off with the bill. I will recommend him to everyone I know that needs to call a good honest and affordable plumber.

Jason came out this morning and installed a pressure regulator and shutoff valve for me. From the time I called him I knew he was the right guy for the job. He is very friendly and has a lot of experience. Before he even started he wanted to make sure that’s what was causing my low pressure problem. So he did a couple of checks and verified it was a bad PRV. He did a fantastic job with the installation and his price was outstanding. If I need any other plumbing repairs he will be my go to plumber for now on. Thank you Jason.
JP re-plumbed my entire 75 year old house and did quality work. I just had him back out to do move some appliance hook-ups and it turned out great as always
Professional work at a fair price. Gave me a quote before starting the job, and it took a little longer than expected. His price was exactly as quoted.
I contacted JPs plumbing during their water heater sell, thé service was great! I’ll never use another plumber.
He did a wonderful job. He was there on time. He his pricing is far and honest.

Jason & Dawn worked me into their busy schedule to fix a leaky faucet. Jason went the extra mile to advise us on another small repair instead of billing us. Would recommend for anyone in Cabot/Lonoke County.
JP's Plumbing was on time and found our leak quickly and made the repair and his price is very reasonable.
Left 2 messages for a quote on their website. Was told you will hear back within 48 hours via email.  I got nothing no call no email
One of the best plumbing contractors  I have ever dealt with. Thanks again JP.

Mr.  J.P himself came out to look at a musty smell in our bathroom. He went above and beyond to diagnose the problem,  explaining his train of thought the entire time and making sure we understood what was going on. We had an excellent experience and would gladly hire him again!
Good guy. Good plumber. Knows what he is doing.

J Dodson Plumbing (ChIJv2MMMNlUzYcRMfKtJ.text: They are very professional and provide a GREAT service.

Thank you for replacing our Tankless Hot Water heater.  ( 0n May 13)  You where so quick to come help us.  We appreciate you so much. I will recommend you highly.
Patricia Ashworth - 40 Wildwood Place Circle LR
He was amazing years back & continues to be awesome
Jeremy is our go to. He always gets us taken care of quickly. Provides excellent quality at a fair price. If you need plumbing work, this is your guy.
They installed me a new water heater at a good price. I called around it it was about as low as I could get. Professional job and took care of me.
Jeremy is a great guy.  Great company.
Great guy. Excellent plumber.
Absolutely would recommend.
Jeremy always is professional. Does a good job and was here promptly.

We had a leak in our gas line due to a neighbor’s construction. He had called the other company out and had them helping him find and fix the gas leak by the end of the next day. He was like a dog on a bone and wasn’t going to stop until it was fixed…he was there within a couple of hours to begin the work also!

We have just recently moved to Benton and just like people all over Arkansas, our pipes froze, leaving us with no water and holiday guest on their way. Mr Dodson and one of his men came in a matter of minutes and started the unthawing process. I have no doubt he is still out there today ,Dec. 23, in frigid temps unthawing those in need. Thanks again and God Bless!!!  Will definitely use and recommend in the future.

Jeremy is the most reliable and trustworthy plumber I've ever worked with. He is responsive and really cares about the customers he works with.

On a Saturday morning, after multiple issues with a hot water heater, he came to the rescue. Even having to locate and install a new unit, he was happy to help. He put his weekend plans on hold to come help me out and that will not be forgotten.

Jeremy is the epitome of customer first service and is willing to go above and beyond to ensure satisfaction. I will never call another plumber...
Jeremy was able to come help us that very evening. He was professional, knowledgeable and did quality work! We will be using him for future plumbing needs. Highly recommend.

Mr. Dodson is very professional and was prompt when we called him. He discussed with us the problems he found and how he would fix them, including a price. We didn't go without water very long because he took care of us. I highly recommend this company. I have worked with other plumbers and none compare to his knowledge and professionalism.
I've used Jeremy a few times and he's always been on time and professional. I would recommend him to anyone.
Prompt, professional, knowledgeable and fair. I wouldn't dream of calling anyone else with my plumbing needs.
Very professional. Reasonable price.

Jeremy answers his phone, gives accurate reasonable estimates, arrives when he says he will, does quick quality work, and genuinely seems like a nice guy.  I don’t often recommend people but I was very pleased with his work and highly recommend him.  He was highly recommended to me by our local plumbing supply company.
We had a great experience with J Dodson Plumbing.  We will be using him again next time we have any plumping issues!!!

I was referred to Jeremy by word of mouth and have called on him several times because of the level of customer service.  One of the few service calls where I felt that I received more than my money's worth.  Always polite and punctual.  Quotes have been on par or better than competitors.  On more than one occasion, Jeremy has steered me away from unnecessary and costly repairs/replacements that I suggested.  His work ethic is excellent, and he is the first person I call for plumbing or suspected plumbing issues.

Recommend this gentlemen for your home plumbing repairs. He's fair and honest. If he says he will be their at a certain time, count on it. Prices seem to be in line with others. Will use Jeremy for all our further needs here in Hot Springs Vlllage.

J Dodson came out immediately and fixed our hot water leak under the house. He really saved the day. He is very polite easy to talk to and knowledgeable for your plumbing needs. His pricing was way more than fair. I really expected it to cost more compared to other companies prices. We will get him to fix some other plumbing issues. I highly recommend calling J Dodson Plumbing.

I called them this morning and he came out this afternoon and within
30 min fixed my water heated.  And he explained why the pilot light
went out.  I would recommend them to anyone who needs a plumber. He
was really a nice man.

Mr Dodson came to our house today on our hot water heater.  He was so professional and had our problem fixed in 30 minutes. He was knowledgeable about it and explained everything as he went. He explained his charges before he came out and did not over charge us. We highly recommend him. Thanks you for coming on the weekend and not charging a after hour charge.  Excellent work.

The Browns

I called three other plumbers.  Between the three, I scheduled 7 (yes, seven) appointments.  All kept on being no-shows.  J Dodson plumbing, my fourth plumber, came out without any excuses, spent a couple hours troubleshooting, and fixed my problem.  Nice guy, extremely fair pricing. If I need a plumber again, he will definitely be my first call.

J. Dodson was on point! Fair and honest no  price gouging here! Big name  company quoted me over 300% what Jeremy did.  Likes what he does and you can see it in his work!  Very professional and personal! Will call again for sure!
Great job and fair rates.

A State Plumbing LLC (ChIJMzMR5v770ocRH7.text: Great Plumbing Company. Excellent/Friendly Staff. They will take care of any plumbing problem you have. Only plumbing company I will ever use
Everyone really cares.  Have used many times and are always on time or will call to update.  I have never had a bad experience or a do over.  Bill @ Donna

A state is absolutely awesome! They’re been out to our home for multiple things and have always been upfront about not only pricing but what we really needed to get our problems fixed. They won’t sell you something you don’t actually need! The guys are super friendly and respectful every time they’ve came. I won’t use any one other than a state for any plumbing issue I ever have! These are my go to guys! Thanks again A state!

We are trying to sell our house and had a leak spring in a couple of our water heater pipes.  I called them and asked if they could have someone out as soon as possible and a couple of hours later the issue was fixed!! Bill and Keegan were very pleasant and helpful! Thank you!!

The plumbers arrived on time and quickly assessed our problem. We were told the procedure to get it replaced under our home warranty.   The report was promptly sent in.  They were very efficient and polite.
Quick, professional, and friendly! Would recommend and will hire again.
I appreciate their prompt response and friendly service
They went above and beyond to fix my problem, they didn't give up when it got difficult. Forever grateful and will definitely call them again for plumbing needs.

Billy came out to fix our leak
He was punctual, professional, and answering any question I had.
We are happy with our service
Thank you
Simply amazing! Professionalism and quality, unmatched. If you are looking for a plumber, call these guys! They are the most honest and hard working in the state!
They tried to fix my commode but it has to be replaced
They were prompt to respond to my  request for service.  Technicians were very polite and professional.
The up most amazing plumbing company, dependable, fast and great customer service

A State Plumbing deleted my previous review so I'm reposting it. They don't want people knowing they do bad business. So here it is again. STAY AWAY find another Plumbing service. My toilet stopped flushing they came out to fix it.  I asked the tech while he was here to replace a clearly dry rotted handle. He told me this handle in the picture is fine even though the handle was clearly rotting and about to break. He said if I wanted it fixed I would have to put in another order paying full cost again. He said I'm supposed to specify everything wrong before they come out. How am I supposed to know everything causing the flushing problem I'm not a professional they are.  They were very unprofessional and greedy for more money find another plumbing service. I gave them a chance to make it right and they refused.

We used this company a couple times for some issues with our plumbing and couldn't be happier. Great customer service and more importantly great work. It's no surprise to me this company continues to grow.
The Guys from A State were not only fast, friendly, and efficient... they also fit me in sooner than scheduled and came early. I will be using them from now on. Thank You.

Bonafide Plumbing Services LLC (ChIJoV1V.text: This company goes above and beyond. The prices are always fair and I know without a doubt it’s done right! No short cuts. Will always call them for my plumbing needs. Thanks again guys for the great work!
They helped me with an installation of a gas range. Very professional!!

Mason Plumbing Co (ChIJ1QAIfhIYMoYRs05Ob.text: Pleased with the service I received.

What a terrible experience not only with a very rude lady who answers the phone (telling me too get a life...at one time) but then the owner of the company who I thought I would have a conversation with just says...we do not do work for third parties and hung up on me!

When I spoke to the lady trying to explain that I would pay them with a credit card or even give them my credit card information up front it did not matter. This place is a joke and deserves to be out of business for the lack of professionalism they BOTH illustrated. Do not be fooled by there answering machine that says...have a blessed day, should be more like.. unless you have cash up front we will not show up!!
Awesome service. Very friendly staff from the call placed to the end of the service performed. Will definitely use for services in the future!!! Thanks for doing an awesome job
I call.  They show up.  They fix the problem for a good price.

Mason Plumbing was very responsive. He came in and completed the job in a very short time. I would recommend MASON PLUMBING anytime. Thanks so much. We were NOT overcharged like the other plumber did us.  Thank you Thank You.

I called to have a hot water heater replaced and to repair a leaking toilet. Was charged over $850 for the hot water heater itself plus other charges for parts, labor, and various other "fees" totaling more than $1,400. Beware! Always ask for an estimate first.
Great service and great guys, very professional and courteous. Always on time, honest, and just all round great service.  Honest, honest service!
They always get to me quickly and provide quality work at reasonable prices. I've used Mason's for 20+ years and wouldn't go anywhere else!

Allan's Plumbing (ChIJN5VGPlD_LYYR7Ou8OY.text: Great plumber with good prices.  Great communication and hard worker.
Remodeled a bathroom and he did the plumbing. Super nice guy, timely work...great service! Will hire again!

Plumb Perfect LLC (ChIJ7YwD1rwSnYcRzLVIc.text: hard working and great customer service!!!

CASCo Plumbing (ChIJf896jKtxMoYR_f3QBtor.text: CASCo Plumbing is great. We were having issues at our home in Camden and CASCo was the one who responded. They were quick to fix the issue even with the complications that come along with an old home. Their pricing is also very reasonable.
Personable, efficient, timely. Cody is the best! He’s the only one I trust to work on my house. Thank you, for everything you’ve done for me!
Flexible with reasonable pricing, really they've been life savers when one of the old pipes in my house broke causing it to flood with dirt.

I called CASco Plumbing for help with a main drain clog. Cody and his helper worked for hours to resolve the issue. I found them to be friendly, professional, courteous and communicated very well what they had to do. They were prompt arriving and Cody charged a very reasonable price for a lot of hard work. I'll definitely use CASco again.
Kind, professional and very skilled. We will use him whenever we need a plumber!

Great plumber, with great attitude even though he was clearly under the weather. Had an estimate a few weeks before project started and was able to cut cost even more once beginning. Would definitely reccomend!

Pamplin services (ChIJt2CWiD6jLYYRMlcJZF.text: They listened to the job I wanted done and delivered efficiently. The owner is very professional and cares about his customers.  I would recommend this company to anyone and without hesitation use them again in the future.
Great service and quality work. I highly recommend pamplin services to anyone.

Crabtree Plumbing (ChIJ97NraeNgM4YRMjcop.text: Excellent work. Fair prices. Very professional!

Lovejoy Diamond Screens would like to thank Justin Crabtree and his employees for their prompt and personable services. Would differently call him again if needed and highly recommend his quality work.
Very unreliable. No call no show for three weeks. Call someone else.
Justin is excellent, prompt, knows his business. I recommend Justin as the best.

LaRue Plumbing Inc (ChIJrehgvxROzYcR-YCz.text: Mr. Steve and his team are great

I had spent almost three days looking for my septic tank before I called LaRue. Although he already had a full days work, Steve found time to help me. In less than 30 minutes he'd found the tank & both service hatches, cleared the blockage & made arrangements to replace the old pipe. I'd give him 6 stars if I could.

During our renovation, we found an active water leak in our master bathroom. We called and they were able to work us into the schedule and got everything repaired very quickly. The two guys that came out were very professional and did an awesome job! Pretty affordable too considering how fast they got to us. Very pleased.
Excellent service

Very, personable, clean and neat. Explained the problem with kitchen faucet not attached right, slow water flow and corrosion around base. He brought the replacement, quoted a price for installation and then was under his quote by $25. He let me pick the faucet style and finish through photos in text message. I would highly recommend this plumber.
Good luck! I would leave a comment if they ACTUALLY did any work. Never could get a response back.
LaRue Plumbing is the best!  Right in the middle of two snow storms, which we know is rare for Arkansas, they came over and replaced our cracked toliet.  Excellent company!

Mr. LaRue was unable to fit me in his schedule for same day service, but did spend about 10 minutes in the phone with me explaining some possible fixes to my plumbing problem. Very pleasant, and great advice.

Am in need of a plumber to repair a leak., Called him twice and he never returned my call. At least he could have called. Won't call again.
F. L. J.

Awesome experience. Family owned and operated, professional and quick. They fixed our problem and we couldnt be happier, we are working on starting other projects around our property and intend to use La Rue's plumbing to get it all done.

Steve was great! Very professional and affordable. Glad to have found a reliable plumber which seems impossible these days. I appreciated the fact that they were good to not track in mud or dirt as we had issues with the sewer line. We'll definitely be using them again!!

Steve was really great about squeezing me in due to a plumbing emergency. He addressed the issues I had and took the time to discuss potential future issues and how to address them. Very good, very quick, and very professional.

Steve was so professional and knowledgeable. I knew right away this was a trust worthy company! Extremely fair prices and quality work! Also very quick service! Have found our go to plumber for all needs!

I called over one week in advance to schedule a small plumbing job.
We both agreed on the following Monday or Tuesday; it is now Tuesday 4:00 p.m.
When I call he rejects the call.
I called a very compitent plumber by the name of Chris Dyer, he is on his way.
If you ever have any plumbing issues call Chris.
Replaced my water heater when it was leaking. He was very clean and polite.  In and out in an hour.  Also replaced my water regulator a year back when it busted.  He is my go to plumber.

The two men who showed up to replace her hot water heater which rusted open and was gushing hot water everywhere we jerks to say the least worst customer service I have personally ever seen. They charged her 900 plus tax for not even a hour worth of work 450 for the hot water heater and the rest in labor they didn't clean up any water I did I borrowed the neighbors shop vac and removed the water they just rolled in a new hot water heater and left they opened the back door didn't say anything and just let her cat out.  On the way out they only thing he said was that i could clean up the house now which was obviously a mess from the gushing water. They also ripped her floor by moving her washer and dryer which was extremely soft from the hot gushing water they have no respect for personal property not worth your money choose anyone else it's the biggest rip off in Benton. If give them no stars if It would let me what a joke.
All-around good guy, honest and straight shooter. Was able to help me with an issue over the phone where as others would have charged a fee for the information.

Steve La Rue and his guys are great ! We have use them for both business and personal issues and the always do a great job.
Prompt service with reasonable prices !

Steve  and his crew are top notch!!  They are professional, timely, and available within minutes.  After completing a remodelling job at our new 18,000 sq. ft facility, LaRue Plumbing is now working on a remodel at a 2nd business location for us.  I would not only recommend him for commercial work but also residential remodeling, repair, and service calls.  You won't be disappointed.
Steve has helped us on many many projects.  Very professional and always cares about our issues.  Highly recommend him if you have any plumbing needs!

Had a water heater that had to be changed before we could get the permit to open our new restaurant.  Steve came within the hour and had me fixed up in 30 minutes.  Got us past our inspection and back on schedule to open on time.   Thanks Steve

Steve stopped by to help fix a pipe that slipped out under pressure and when he arrived it had already been repaired.  He still stuck around to talk with us about other plumbing related items we had upcoming with plans for the addition of a bathroom and refused to let us pay him for his time.  His professionalism and courtesy were top notch and we'll be recommending him to everyone in the Benton, AR area.

Thanks Steve!
What a great company! Easy to work with, high quality work, and overall a very pleasant expierence. I will forever use LaRue plumbing for all our plumbing needs!

When I had a gas leak in my yard, Centerpoint pulled my meter and told me I was responsible for getting the line fixed.  Just call a plumber.  Well I didn't know any plumbers and just got the phone book.  I was very blessed when I called Steve Larue.  He was knowledgeable, helpful and prompt.
His company is very thorough and easy to work with.  He went out of his way to find out about the gas company moving meters and saved me $1400.00 on my job. I will recommend Larue to everyone and I will use him again.  He is now my go to guy.  I wish him and his the best. May I add that I am a single, disabled woman and never once felt like I was being taken advantage of.

We have used LaRue Plumbing for our home several times.  Steve LaRue and his company are top-notch.  He is always available for an emergency, and always gets the job done at reasonable prices.  Good small business and a good plumber.
